name: hymnoscribe
description: HymnoScribe is a hymn and song management application for churches or music leaders. It organizes lyrics, chords and sets, and provides a web interface for planning services and exporting or displaying song sheets.
features: Song Library: Organize hymns and worship songs with lyrics, chords, and metadata.
Chord Charts: Display and edit chord progressions for musicians and worship teams.
Service Planning: Plan worship services by creating setlists and song orders.
Lyrics Display: Project lyrics on screens for congregation viewing during services.
Transposition: Automatically transpose songs to different keys for vocalists.
Song Sheets: Generate and export printable song sheets with lyrics and chords.
Search Functionality: Find songs quickly by title, lyrics, or theme.
Team Collaboration: Share setlists and song arrangements with worship team members.
